Html:
Hi there,

while trying to develop my own series for the charting component, I noted some obstacles. Ie - I was trying to reuse some of the code from areaseries (the class is apparently sealed) and when doing so, I've noted that:

a) The property PlotArea is internal - why?

b) The class ValueHelper is internal - why?

c) DataPointsByIndependentValue is internal - Why?

 

I'm not quite sure why these members / classes need to be internal. I think it would facilitate the development if those would be public.

 

Thanks,

Andreas
